title: A Dog's Tail
description: This book was created to help children deal with the possibility of friends or family members having cancer. It was written by the author after a close friend's young daughter passed away from a battle with cancer. It highlights the importance of family and friends supporting and encouraging each other during the difficult times cancer can create. This challenging topic is presented in a manner that is easy for children to understand. The book uses humor at times to help lighten the heavy hearts of those coping with sickness. It includes real-life ways others can help people impacted by cancer.ï»¿
author: Seth Weitkamp
